text: Kaya to manusya jyaci chati (hrdaya) allahane islamakarita khuli kelii ahe, tara to apalya palanakartyatarphe eka nura (prakasa) vara ahe, ani sarvanasa ahe tya lokankarita, jyanci hrdaye allahacya smaranane (prabhavita hota nahi, kimbahuna) kathora jhali aheta. He loka purnatah margabhrastateta padale aheta
